create_extensions: CREATE EXTENSION IF NOT EXISTS postgis
sql.select_columns: SELECT column_name, data_type from information_schema.columns WHERE table_schema='{0}' AND table_name='{1}'
sql.select_db_count: SELECT COUNT(datname) from pg_database WHERE datname='{0}'
sql.select_geometry_columns: SELECT f_table_catalog, f_table_schema AS schema, f_table_name AS table_name, f_geometry_column AS column_name, coord_dimension, srid, type FROM public.geometry_columns
sql.select_schema_count: SELECT COUNT(schema_name) FROM information_schema.schemata WHERE schema_name = '{0}'
sql.select_schema_tables: SELECT table_name FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema = '{0}' AND table_type='BASE TABLE'
sql.select_tables: SELECT table_schema, table_name from information_schema.tables WHERE table_type='BASE TABLE'
sql.select_tables_in_schema: SELECT table_schema, table_name from information_schema.tables WHERE table_type='BASE TABLE' AND table_schema='{0}'
